title: Learning together
content: Challenge Factory is a concept for working as a summer trainee for the N4S Project in JAMK University of Applied Sciences. As a Challenge Factory member you get to work with N4S@JAMK team. N4S@JAMK team acts as mentors within Challenge Factory and gives several challenges to seize with modern working methods. LEAN Startup Methodolody, MVP, QA, Test Automation, CI and CD, Service Design, UX... did we get you interested? Send us an email!
